role.argrole: filled with, usually marked with ب

example.parse: (CONJ و) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التفجير) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN المروع)) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN جزيرة) (NP (NOUN_PROP بالي))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الاندونيسية))) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تعج) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN السياح) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN الغربيين)))))))))))) (PUNC ")
